text: Emilia Pérez is a 2024 Spanish-language French musical crime comedy movie written and directed by Jacques Audiard. The movie stars Zoe Saldaña, Karla Sofía Gascón, Selena Gomez, Adriana Paz, Mark Ivanir, and Édgar Ramírez. It is about a Mexican cartel leader who hires a lawyer to help her disappear and transitioning into a woman. ==References== Category:2024 musical movies Category:2020s crime movies Category:2024 comedy movies Category:French musical movies Category:French crime movies Category:French comedy movies Category:French LGBT movies Category:Spanish-language movies Category:2020s LGBT movies Category:Golden Globe Award winning movies
title: Emilia Pérez
